Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,

Price: $29.95 - $25.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:19:38 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The only tool in the marketplace able to diagnose & repair LED lights!

The LED Keeper fixes LED holiday light sets. It is every decorator’s must-have and saves you not only time, but money. No need to toss your pre-lit décor when you have lights out. Use the LED Keeper to keep your holidays bright!

How it Works

The LED Keeper uses insulation piercing to connect to the copper within the light set wires and illuminate functioning sections by creating mini-circuits. Success is achieved through the process of elimination.

Complete Tool for the Repair of LED Light Sets

The LED Keeper pays for itself and is provides everything you’d need to fix a light set:

Built-in Bulb & Fuse Tester
Includes 2 Universal Replacement PODs
2 Place Markers to assist in testing are also included
Comes complete with a 9V battery
Has a Bulb Puller

Fixes sets with replaceable or non-replaceable bulbs

Use a POD if your set is experiencing a socket issue that cannot be solved, if the precise replacement bulb for the set cannot be located, or if the set has non-replaceable (sealed construction) LEDs. The PODs were designed to repair LEDs only. If you were to use a POD on an incandescent set, the set would not illuminate and remain dysfunctional. The PODs were not designed to illuminate but are necessary for the repair of the LED set in order to maintain the electrical balance. If a POD is not used and a dead bulb/socket remains, then more voltage is being forced upon the remaining functional bulbs.

Every decorator’s must-have!

This Cool Yule Tool saves you time and money. No more throwing your light sets and pre-lit décor away. Now you can save them with the squeeze of a trigger. There are also numerous resources available to assist you as you become a light set repair Pro yourself! We have instructional videos and even have a toll-free number available with U.S.-based techs to assist in all of your light set repair questions.

Fixes LED Light Sets (Does NOT work on Incandescent light sets)
2 Universal PODs included to assist with socket issues or if you simply don’t have the correct replacement bulb your set requires
2 Place Markers included to assist with testing
One 9 Volt battery included
Pays for itself
Intended for conventional Christmas LED light sets that are manufactured in series design.
Cannot assist with incandescent, rope lights, light sets with control boxes, low voltage or battery-operated light sets.


The only tool in the marketplace able to diagnose & repair LED lights!

The LED Keeper fixes LED holiday light sets. It is every decorator’s must-have and saves you not only time, but money. No need to toss your pre-lit décor when you have lights out. Use the LED Keeper to keep your holidays bright!

Read more

  • Built-in Bulb & Fuse Tester
  • Includes 2 Universal Replacement PODs
  • 2 Place Markers to assist in testing are also included
  • Comes complete with a 9V battery
  • Has a Bulb Puller

Use a POD if your set is experiencing a socket issue that cannot be solved, if the precise replacement bulb for the set cannot be located, or if the set has non-replaceable (sealed construction) LEDs. The PODs were designed to repair LEDs only. If you were to use a POD on an incandescent set, the set would not illuminate and remain dysfunctional. The PODs were not designed to illuminate but are necessary for the repair of the LED set in order to maintain the electrical balance. If a POD is not used and a dead bulb/socket remains, then more voltage is being forced upon the remaining functional bulbs.

It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:33:35 UTC – Details)



SOLAR POWERED & 8 MODES：Put the Christmas Lollipop stake lights outdoor and keep the switch “ON”, it will automatically charge during the day and light up at night. It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash and steady on. Note: the solar power is light control, the pathway lights will not light up with the daylight.
WATERPROOF & EASY TO INSTALL：Fcysy Lollipop Led Christmas Lights outdoor are IP44 waterproof which means it can stand with any weather condition. Easy to install, you can stake the Xmas lights to anywhere you want to decorate.
PERFECT CHRISTMAS DÉCOR OUTDOOR: Brighten your Garden with our classic solar lollipop lights. Solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof can be used in pathway, walkway, and driveway, front yards, garden and lawn decoration. Share the warm Christmas atmosphere with your neighbors.
IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT: This cute and warm light up lollipop yard light is perfect gift for friends and family. It is a useful Christmas and holiday Day gift to decorate festival, can be placed anywhere outside your home to create perfect holiday atmosphere.

This lighted snowman would be the perfect decoration for not only indoor but also outdoor with ground stakes, zip ties, water-resistant power cord and adaptor which make it more stable and durable for outside. Attention: this outdoor Christmas decoration is NOT supposed to be used in heavy windy or rainy days.
【OUTDOOR CHRISTMAS DISPLAY】: BOMMETER 3FT Lighted Pop Up Christmas Snowman Decorations, Pre-Lit Light Up 48 LED Cool White Lights, with top hat and green scarf, Collapsible Easily Metal Stand Easy-Assembly Reusable for Holiday Xmas Indoor Outdoor Decor: Garden & Outdoor

【48 PRE-LIT LED LIGHTS】: This outdoor lighted Snowman features 48 cool white LED lights, create a glowing nighttime display, Battery design for easy use, will brighten up your Christmas decor by creating an attractive focal point in your yard or porch.
【EASY ASSEMBLE AND STORAGE】: This Snowman yard decoration with collapsible design for quick, easy set up and space saving storage, perfect for a small place, no tools or specialized skills are required, please refer to the detailed installation picture on picture 6. If you have any question for install the snowman, please kindly feel free to tell us.
【COLLAPSIBLE CHRISTMAS DECORATIONS】: This Christmas Snowman come in a nice box that can be a Christmas gift for your family and friends, it can be used to decor your office, the living room, dining room or entryway. Great for Christmas themed Party, Christmas indoor and outdoor decorations, or Christmas yard decoration!

Premium Quality:Made of plastic cardboard, light and durable, waterproof and weatherproof. High quality printing technology will not fade easily.These Christmas yard sign with light are very suitalbe for outdoor, and can be reused for many years.
Easy to use:These Christmas yard decorations has Simple Assembly Required.The package will give you 8 pieces of large sign and 16 plastic poles. You only need to insert two poles into the North Pole sign and press them into the ground. The package also comes with 4 pieces of 2m string light and 40 stickers. You can stick these string lights on signs to make them glow in the dark.
Unique Design:Unlike other products, the design of these Christmas yard signs are more interesting and vivid. Sticking them in the ground will create the effect of coming out of the ground.It will be a unique decoration for Christmas.
Christmas Decorations:These Christmas yard signs are specific and rich in Christmas elements. Decorating them in your yard will attract the attention of neighbors and passers-by and make your Christmas memorable.

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine’s Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

—Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

—8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

— 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

—Timer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

—Memory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

—Safe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

—IP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual
【Warm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control】Including (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. 【IP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS】Perfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
【4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function】Our Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
【Safety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape】UL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
【What You Get & Quality Assurance】1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don’t hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

Super long 1000 LED Christmas String Lights

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual

1 x colorful gift box

We wish you can have a colorful holidays

8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control

Christmas string lights come with 8 modes, including combination, in waves,slo-glo,chasing/fade, slow fade,twinkling/flash,sequential, in wave modes.From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

Safe to Touch & IP44 Waterproof

Stay cool, you can use and touch them outdoors or indoors safely. Come with a 29V low voltage power plug. More safe and Less power consumption.IP44 waterproof and designed to withstand bad weather.

Timer & Memory Function

Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. Built in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset everyday.

4 Brightness Levels

Press DIM+/Dim- via remote controller to adjust brightness level (100%-75%-50%-25%) to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

Product Description

Welcome to whovilve: The red and green design with the words “Welcome to whovilve”, Christmas tree, hat and other elements are integrated. It’s a great way to brighten up the day of anyone passing by your home.
What’s in the package: A folded yard sign with “Welcome to whovilve” printed on it. 29.7*11.1inch. and some fixing brackets.
Easy to use: The sign is folded, just unfold it and fix the stake on the ground. Convenient and quick.
Suitable for the occasion: this product, which is perfect to match with any Christmas decoration, will not be at all out of place. You can decorate it in your garden, lawn, patio, front door, etc. Welcome every guest who arrives at your home. Add more highlights and a strong festive atmosphere to your Christmas holiday.
Perfect after-sales service. If you have any problems or defects in the process of purchase or use, you can contact us. We will provide service to ensure you have a perfect shopping experience to celebrate this annual, grand holiday.
